data.title: ICT Directorate – Gombe State University
data.text: Seminar on IBM Digital Nation Africa (D_NA). Presented by Moyona Adeoti (University Relation leader IBM West Africa). (40 staff participated including the then Vice Chancellor, Prof. I.M Umar, OON in attendance). Thursday 21st - June 2018 Training on Virtual Library Management and Administration. (14 staff participated from ICT and the University library). Thursday 28th - June 2018 Microsoft CFE (AfDB) Training (20 Staff both academic and non-teaching staff). Tuesday 31st July - 4th August 2018 Training on Online Compiler for Management Staff. (18 Staff participated) Monday 13th August 2018 Training on Online Compiler for Registration Officers GSU (53 Staff participated). Tuesday 14th August 2018 Training on Asset Management Procurement And Inventory for MDAs outside Abuja organized by the office of the Accountant General of the federation through “Government Integrated Finance Management Information System (GIFMIS). (460 participants from the North East). 25th September 2018 - 5th October 2018 AfDB CfE Volunteer Meeting (3rd ) chaired by the then Vice Chancellor, Prof. I.M Umar, OON Friday 12th October 2018 AfDB CfE Volunteers Meeting (4th ) Chaired by Dr Bala Modi Wednesday 5th December 2018 Training on AfDB-Microsoft Hour of Code (HoC) (556 participants from outside community). 11th December - 14th December 2018 Provision of Tools for Women (workshop) in North East Organized and delivered by National Information Technology Development Agency (NITDA). 14th -18th January 2019 Workshop on MOOC organized by Academic Planning Directorate GSU for Academic Staff. (100 participants). February 25th - 26th 2019 AfDB First Batch of Training for the Youths (120 participants). 11th March 2019 - 5th April 2019 AfDB Second Batch of Training for the Youths (150 participants). 17th June 2019 -10th July 2019 Google Digital Partnership Tour 10th - 12th July, 2019 Training on Asset Management Procurement And Inventory for MDAs outside Abuja organized by the office of the Accountant General of the Federation through “Government Integrated Finance Management Information System. (300 participants from the North East). 16th - 20th August, 2019. Facebook Seminar organized by Briatek Computers Nigeria LTD for GSU students. (145 participants). 7th September 2019 Sanstonz-Google Digital Workshop organized by Google Reps for Student GSU (113 participants). 21st September 2019 ADAPTI Workshop organized by DBI-NCC for GSU Staff (110 participants). 16th - 20th September 2019 Youth-Mappers Workshop organized for the Staffs and Students of the Geography Department of Gombe State University (150 Participants) 28th -29th February, 2020 Training for Online Compiler update for Exams Officers, Registration Officers and SIWES coordinators, organized by ICT Directorate (25 participants) Tuesday 14th January 2020 English Language Forum outreach by the U.S Embassy attended by the English Language Department Lecturers of Gombe State University (11 participants) Tuesday 28th January 2020 ICT Staff Training on GSU Website and Compiler Migration Process (9 participants) 27th July, 2020 - 07th August, 2020 Virtual Closing Ceremony and presentation of certificates to the participants of the 1st batch of the Gombe State University Beneficiaries on Coding for Employment (CfE) by the African Development Bank (AfDB) and partners (240 participants) Wednesday 05th August, 2020 The 2nd batch of the Gombe State University Beneficiaries on Coding for Employment (CfE) by the African Development Bank (AfDB) and partners (100+ participants) Sept-Oct, 2020 TetFund-Sponsored Website and Online Compiler Training for ICT Staffs (138 Staffs). 14th – 18th January 2021 NITDA (NAVSA) Training (150 Beneficiaries). 16th – 22nd March, 2021 NIGCOMSAT VSAT Installation Training (50 Beneficiaries). 22nd – 26th March, 2021. ADAPTI’20 Workshop organized by DBI-NCC for GSU Staff (110 participants). 26th – 30th April 2021 ICDL Basic, Intermediate and Advance Training for Selected Staffs of GSU (230 Combined Participants). 03rd – 08th May, 2021 Huawei Academy Briefing and Meeting by the National Channel Manager (110 Participants). 28th June 2021 Huawei Academy Training on DataComm (64 Registered Students and ongoing). 31st August – 31st October, 2021
